text: Christer Kleiven (born 9 April 1988) is a Norwegian midfielder who currently plays for Vigør in the 3. Divisjon. ==Club career== ===FK Vigør=== As a youth player Kleiven played for Vigør. ===IK Start=== He made his debut for Start in 2007, playing in Adeccoligaen. He made 35 appearances and scored 3 goals that season. Christer Kleiven had a good start in Tippeligaen 2010. Having scored no goals for IK Start in Tippeligaen, he started the season of with 5 goals in 5 matches. ===Stabæk Fotball=== Before the 2012 season, Christer Kleiven signed a contract with Norwegian Premier League club Stabæk. ===Odd=== Before the 2013-season, Christer Kleiven signed a contract with Odd after one season at Stabæk. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |2007 |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Start |Tippeligaen |8||0||3||2||11||2 |- |2008 |Adeccoligaen |28||3||1||1||29||4 |- |2009 |rowspan="6" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |22||0||2||0||24||0 |- |2010 |25||7||4||2||29||9 |- |2011 |25||1||5||0||30||1 |- |2012 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Stabæk |30||3||2||1||32||4 |- |2013 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Odd |16||0||3||1||19||1 |- |2014 |0||0||2||0||2||0 |- |2015 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Vigør |rowspan="1" valign="center"|3.
